data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
HL7 is a protocol on the 7th ISO layer of networking, defining what
    messages look like, how they are sent, and also defining message
    types. There is nothing yet in the CPAN modules that does HL7. The
    module I propose provides the OO interface to hL7 connections and
    messages.
